list_definition.definition: a gambling game using cards with numbered squares

list_ex_of_english: After closing as a cinema in the fifties, it housed bingo and shops.
During its time the premises hosted a single-parent club, photographic club, dancing and bingo.
The bingo logic is frequently used on scratch card games.
Later that same year, the bingo hall closed its doors for the last time.
The group reenters and returns to the bingo game.
Wild numbers allow bingo players to start with multiple called numbers.
The entire audience would have their own bingo card and would cross off the phrase once it was called out.
Bingo is also played and a game of snooker can be had anytime the club is open.
